Articles.Content:
I think I have found a bug, but I am not sure how to reproduce it so I'm not sure if I should post it on the bug tracker. Basically is seems that parts of my craft become stuck in some sort of point in space and disconnect but are still being calculated as being there. It pulls the camera way off center and I pretty much am not able to control the craft any more.

http://imgur.com/a/SLfSR Here is a link to a screenshot of the problem and a screenshot of the debug menu.
